title: Tuscan-style "Patriots" logo
content:
Antyone have idea for this font..........?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/862-Patroit_5248.jpg)

 [‹ (x) SendOutCards logo - Nueva Condensed {Tiff, Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753/http:/typophile.com/node/44064 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font ID: Sacré Français music video fonts... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753/http:/typophile.com/node/44065 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content:
Probably custom. You can get quite close with [Lynchburg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/lynchburg/), [Cactus Flower](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/cactus-flower-sg/), [Buckhorn](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/buckhorn/) or other [Tuscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tuscan) style faces.

F
